system.description:
You refine your existing training to better respond to threats. You gain the Watchful Eye trait of the Steely Mien feature. If you already have it, select a second option. You also gain proficiency in the Perception and Insight skills or if you are already proficient, you gain an expertise die.

Furthermore, as an action you can spend a point of exertion to ignore a number of levels of fatigue equal to your proficiency bonus for 1 hour.
